amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt from the regulatory rulemaking moratorium those regulations required to clarify the provisions of the Family and Medical Leave Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment (printed as amendment No. 20 in the Congressional Record of February 22, 1995), to exempt from the regulatory rulemaking moratorium those regulations required to clarify the provisions of the Family and Medical Leave Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Green amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 241 (Roll no. 169).
